pageContext.claim: “And I was accused by — I believe it was four women. … I was accused by four or five women who got paid a lot of money to make up stories about me. We caught them in the mainstream media refused to put it on television. They refused to even write about it. There were four women, and maybe more, I think the number is four or five.”
pageContext.analysis: More than a dozen women have accused Trump of sexual misconduct.
